content: the spiral tunisian cowl is a sophisticated and modern cowl that uses simple tunisian crochet stitches which makes it a great introduction pattern if you want to learn tunisian crochet the cowl is worked in the round the 10 stitch and 10 row repeating yo eyelet pattern is worked from top to bottom to adjust size for a larger cowl increase the starting chain by a multiple of 10 stitches each 10-stitch repeat will add approximately 3 5 to the circumference this project will require a double-ended crochet hook
